tool_description: Calculates seismic loads and forces on structures using equivalent lateral force method or response spectrum analysis according to seismic building codes.

building_weight.description: Total building weight in kN or lbs

building_height.description: Building height above base in meters or feet

seismic_zone.description: Seismic zone or design category (0, 1, 2, 3, 4, A, B, C, D, E, F)

soil_type.description: Site soil classification (A, B, C, D, E, F)

structural_system.description: Structural system type (moment_frame, braced_frame, shear_wall, dual_system)

importance_factor.description: Seismic importance factor based on occupancy

building_code.description: Seismic building code (IBC, UBC, NBCC, Eurocode8, NZS1170)

fundamental_period.description: Fundamental period of structure in seconds

error_messages: Invalid building parameters: building_weight and building_height must be positive
Unknown seismic zone: Use one of [0, 1, 2, 3, 4, A, B, C, D, E, F]
Unknown soil type: Use one of [A, B, C, D, E, F]
Unknown structural system: Use one of [moment_frame, braced_frame, shear_wall, dual_system]
Invalid importance factor: importance_factor must be between 0.8 and 1.5
Unsupported building code: Use one of [IBC, UBC, NBCC, Eurocode8, NZS1170]
Invalid factors: response_modification must be between 1-8, overstrength_factor between 1-3, deflection_amplification between 1-7
usage: Provide building_weight, building_height, seismic_zone, soil_type, structural_system, importance_factor, and building_code. Optionally specify response_modification, overstrength_factor, deflection_amplification, and fundamental_period for detailed analysis.

calculated_period.description: Calculated fundamental period if not provided
